Quickstrike:



"Sure." He followed.

(What base is this again?)

--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, logomorph@h... wrote:
> DarkMouse::
> 
> SHe noticed he wasn't happy, so she tried something else. "Uh, 
> Quickstrike, I'll help carry the supplies. Can you run guard. If 
> we're ambushed, we'll have our hands too full to fight." She walked 
> over and grabbed a crate and started walking to the base.
> 
> 
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, wilddance_mare@h... wrote:
> > Quickstrike:
> > 
> > 
> > 
> > "Fine," he said with a growing frown. "Don't like this." He 
didn't 
> > like being used to lug around supplies like before this Neo Beast 
> > Wars. He was supposed to be a higher rank. Didn't the lower ranks 
> do 
> > this sort of work? He knew that. He was once one of them.
> > 
> > He took a few steps forward. "What kinda slag they want us t' 
> carry?"
